original_text: Do not add anything to these rules. Do not remove anything from them. You must obey the commands of the Lord your God that I am giving to you.
korean_text: 내가 너희에게 명령하는 말을 너희는 가감하지 말고 내가 너희에게 내리는 너희 하나님 여호와의 명령을 지키라

sentences.original_text: Do not add anything to these rules
Do not remove anything from them
You must obey the commands of the Lord your God
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 너의 하나님 여호와의 명령들을 반드시 순종해야 한다

sentences.original_text: that I am giving to you
